title: Vaccine Manufacturers
description: The Manufacturers section on immunize.org provides website and contact information for vaccine manufacturers, as well as a listing of vaccine products and immunoglobulins.
cleaned_text: | | | |[AstraZeneca](https://www.astrazeneca-us.com/medicines/astrazeneca-medications.html) One MedImmune Way Gaithersburg, MD 20878 | | | |[BioNTech](https://biontech.de/covid-19) 235 East 42nd York, NY 10017 Phone: 1-877-VAX-CO19 (1-877-829-2619) Seventh Street, Ste 100 or 1-877-848-5100 Adjuvanted (Heplisav-B) | | | |[Emergent Biosolutions](https://www.emergentbiosolutions.com/products#infectiousdiseases) 400 Professional Drive, 400 Gaithersburg, (Vaccinia) (ACAM 2000) | | | |[Emergent Travel Health](https://emergenttravelhealth.com/) (Part of Emergent BioSolutions) 400 Professional Drive, Suite 400 MD 20879 Phone: Ty21a (Vivotif) | | | | | |[Massachusetts Biological Labs](http://www.umassmed.edu/massbiologics/) 460 Walk Hill Street Boston, MA 02126 Phone/order: 800-457-4626 Product: Td | | | |[Merck & Pike WP97-A303 West Point, 19486-0004 Products: Zaire Vaccine, Live Phone: 1-866-MODERNA Rd Gaithersburg, MD 20878 Phone: am to 8 pm EST) Email: [https://www.novavax.com/contact-us/email-us](https://www.novavax.com/contact-us/email-us) Product: COVID-19 vaccine | | | |[Pfizer](https://www.pfizerpro.com/) 235 East 42nd St New York, NY 10017 Phone: (Ticovac) | | | |[Pfizer-BioNTech](https://www.cvdvaccine.com/) 235 New York, NY 10017 Phone: 1-877-VAX-CO19 (1-877-829-2619) Products: Comirnaty (COVID-19 | | | |[VBI Vaccines, Inc.](https://www.vbivaccines.com/) 160 Second Street, Floor 3 Cambridge, MA 02142 Phone:
